::Zardus/Prowl/Shredder/DeathStorm/Mosquitor::

Zardus looks at the five bots in the distance. He and Nemesis had flown to 
them from the alliance base. Flying in closer, he lands near them.

"Greetings," He says, "I am Zardus, leader of the alliance."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl walks into the bridge. He was a mess. One of his wings was snapped out 
of it's socket and his leg was shredded. There were scraches and gashes all 
over his chest, stomach, and back, and one of his optics was cacked down the 
middle.

"The predacons are retreating," He says to Iron Raptor, "I think we should 
let them do so. We all need repairs."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Shredder sighs. He had sent out a distress call but no predacons had come to 
his rescue. He looks up again at DeathStorm's gun pointed at his head. 
Without warning, he lashes out with his foot, attempting to trip DeathStorm.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Mosquitor opens his eyes as he hears Rampage's order to fall back. He tries 
to stand up, but his body was too damaged to respond.

"Beast Mode!" He says. He flies away in his mosquito form.
